#20250709 
#Function: TekTronix TDS 2024B init&show measure result
#**.py <USB_Address> <channel1,channel2..>
#**.py USB0::0x0699::0x036A::C032490::INSTR 1,2

#After success
#loacl will create "measurement_log.txt", and will show

Channel 1 Measurements:
Mean Voltage: 0.009 V						Average value
Frequency: 98999999999999993426744560981400092672.000 Hz		Frequency
Peak-to-Peak: 0.060 V						PeaktoPeak
RMS Voltage: 0.060 V						有效值电压						
Maximum Voltage: 0.040 V						Max
Minimum Voltage: -0.020 V						min
